backend/main.mo: Actor imports and includes the MixinStorage blob-storage mixin, exposing storage capabilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a Google Reviews link update and listing affected file, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including styles, components, pages, and data modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining extensive OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file with favicon, SEO metadata, Open Graph/Twitter tags, and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with layout and page routes, including validated search parameters, and renders RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Brand logo component with size variants and fallback text-based mark if the image fails.
frontend/src/components/GalleryImage.tsx: Gallery image card with loading state, error fallback, hover effects, and optional click handling.
frontend/src/components/HeaderSearch.tsx: Search form with controlled input and submit handler returning trimmed query.
frontend/src/components/LogoMotif.tsx: Decorative logo motif component with opacity styling and text fallback on load error.
frontend/src/components/MenuCategoryCaro: Carousel for menu categories supporting keyboard/swipe navigation and rendering items with price badges.
frontend/src/components/MenuScreenshotGa: Gallery that displays a single menu screenshot with loading and graceful error fallback.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable section wrapper applying consistent vertical spacing and container layout.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: React component that updates document title and meta/OG tags based on provided SEO props.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, social links, navigation links, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation, search, CTAs, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/WatermarkBackgro: Displays layered low-opacity repeating watermark images fixed behind all content.
frontend/src/data/menuData.ts: Defines menu categories and items with descriptions and pricing for the restaurant menu.
frontend/src/draft24-exclusions.md: Notes which changes were excluded during restoration to Draft 24 and lists included features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalSwipe.ts: Provides a ref that detects left/right swipe gestures based on touch events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, and light/dark theme CSS variables for the appâ€™s visual design.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Exports constants containing paths to brand images and a list of gallery image metadata.
frontend/src/lib/globalSearchContent.ts: Builds search results for menu items, offers, and pages by normalizing text and matching against predefined data sources.
frontend/src/lib/menuPdf.ts: Empty placeholder for menu PDF-related functionality.
frontend/src/lib/menuPrice.ts: Formats menu item prices, supporting numeric values, labels, and fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/menuScreenshotAssets.ts: Exports an ordered list of menu screenshot asset URLs for consistent display.
frontend/src/lib/socialLinks.ts: Provides a centralized set of social media link URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with restaurant story content, values, and styled sections using shared UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with location, phone, hours, quick actions, and a map section using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with hero branding, cuisine sections, feature stats, and CTA buttons for booking and ordering.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Displays the restaurant menu with search filtering, screenshot gallery, category carousel, and ordering CTA.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Shows a list of promotional offers with icons, descriptions, badges, and terms and conditions.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements global search across menu items, offers, and pages with categorized results and a search form.
frontend/src/types/pdf-lib-global.d.ts: Empty type declaration file for pdf-lib integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and animations while enabling dark mode and plugin support.
project_state.json: Project metadata storing feature lists, state versioning, and a pending request to add a Google review link section.
